revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: ... (I have not received ?) a letter from you. So deign to write me at some point concerning your health. For have I not written to you once, twice, many times enquiring about your state of health. For there is nothing else causing me sorrow apart from this. For I heard here that something distressing has happened to me - you know about what. I greet your ladies mothers and your brothers. Were you not given to my heart ("to my consolation" Preisendanz)? Were you not put ("put to sleep" Schmidt) under (my ?) head-cover? Were you not made by my mother to share my bundle/coverlet?;Verso:;To Kam... (from?) Apoll(onia ?), the daughter of Theodoros
